## About Me

:::: {.card}
::: {.card-header}
Hello there!
:::
::: {.card-body}
::: {#hero-heading}
My name is Thomas Zwagerman. I'm a **Research Software Engineer** at the [British Antarctic Survey](https://www.bas.ac.uk/). I mostly work in R.

I have previously worked as an **Environmental Data Scientist** and as a **Spatial Data Analyst** at the [UK Centre for Ecology and Hydrology](https://www.ceh.ac.uk/).

I have a **BSc in Ecological & Environmental Sciences** from the University of Edinburgh. I wrote my dissertation on vegetation change impact on arctic land-atmosphere interactions and snowmelt in the Arctic.

**Research Interests:**

- FAIR Data and Research Software
- Reproducible Research Methods
- Open Source Scientific Software
- Environmental Forecasting and Digital Twins
:::
:::
